helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hello Team,

I had a Tuberculosis QFT test done through PharmEasy on 1st December, Order ID: 6217701 and I have already received the report. This report is required for submission to my USA university as part of their immunization documentation.

However, the current report does not include my date of birth (15 Dec 2000), due to which my university has rejected my immunization form.

I kindly request you to reissue the test report with my date of birth (15 Dec 2000) included at the earliest.
I have attached the current report, and the email received from the university for your reference.

Thank you for your support.

Regards,
Hemangi Patil

notes.body:
Hello,

I was told that the report is system generated. I need to have the
birthdate addded in my report else my immunization record will not get
accepted. And I have already paid INR 1900 for this test, now just for the
DOB I'll have to go with some other lab. If your system is so rigid you
should have disclose it beforehand my appointment was confirmed. This is
really disappointing, I was not told before that my requests will not be
answered and now I am in this trouble.

Kindly help me with the updated report with DOB or give me other resolution.

Warm regards,
Hemangi Patil
notes.body_html:
Hello,

I was told that the report is system generated. I need to have the birthdate addded in my report else my immunization record will not get accepted. If your system is so rigid you should have disclose it beforehand my appointment was confirmed. This is really disappointing, I was not told before that my requests will not be answered and now I am in this trouble.

Kindly help me with the updated report with DOB or give me other resolution.

Warm regards,
Hemangi Patil

notes.body: Hello Vishal,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the deletion of the old prescription. I will surely assist you with this.     Please be informed that we are unable to remove the old prescription from the system. I kindly request that you place the new order using the current prescription so that the old prescription will not be pre-fetched.   ​  You also have an option to place an order via prescription. You may follow the steps below to place an order by prescription.   Click on Order Medicine - Order via Prescription.  Upload a prescription and proceed to checkout.  Select a delivery address or add a new address.  Select the payment method and place an order.      Please note that you kindly keep your cart empty while placing an order via prescription.     We appreciate your understanding and patience in this matter.  ​  Alternatively, you may kindly share the prescription here so that we can arrange a callback from a certified pharmacist to assist you with placing the order.  ​  Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Vishal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the deletion of the old prescription. I will surely assist you with this.

Please be informed that we are unable to remove the old prescription from the system. I kindly request that you place the new order using the current prescription so that the old prescription will not be pre-fetched. 
​
You also have an option to place an order via prescription. You may follow the steps below to place an order by prescription.
  • Click on Order Medicine - Order via Prescription.
  • Upload a prescription and proceed to checkout.
  • Select a delivery address or add a new address.
  • Select the payment method and place an order.

Please note that you kindly keep your cart empty while placing an order via prescription.

We appreciate your understanding and patience in this matter.
​
Alternatively, you may kindly share the prescription here so that we can arrange a callback from a certified pharmacist to assist you with placing the order.
​
Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

helpdesk_ticket.description:
*Urgent and Most Important*

Dear Shri Naveen

For the last few weeks, a major glitch and/or bug in the system is being
observed at the time of booking orders and the same is causing major
problems and resentment.

*Glitch and/or bug in the system:*


   1. Out of multiple items added to the cart, if one or two items are not
   readily available, the system fails to split the order for multiple
   shipments; rather shows prolonged/delayed EDD based on unavailable item/s.
   2. The problem occurs only if the order is booked in the afternoon or
   evening hours, not in the morning hours.
   3. If the same order is booked in the morning hours, in such cases of
   available and unavailable items in the cart, it is well split for multiple
   shipments.

This needs immediate attention for necessary correction in the system.

Thanks.
M/s MUSKARAS
Madhu Sudan Muskara

Mail: pharmeasy.muskaras@gmail.com

notes.body: Hello Usha,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  With regards to your order #657178311012941824-50875, I can see the requested medicine FORXIGA 10MG STRIP OF 14 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was removed from your order to ensure rest all the medicines are delivered to you.  I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.  I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  Devdas.

notes.body: Hello Manjunath,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  I understand your concern regarding the refund for order ID #656990898980823040-17266. I will surely assist you with the same.  I see the requested medicine XEROLENE MAX MOISTURIZING UREA JAR OF 100GM CREAM was unavailable with our partner retailer.   Please note that at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source.  I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.     I would like to inform you that after the deletion of the medicine, the revised payable amount was ₹550. Accordingly, the item discount was updated from ₹283.52 to ₹228.52, and the order coupon discount was revised from ₹308.95 to ₹231.95.  As a result, the final payable amount was recalculated to ₹397.10. This amount has been initiated as a refund on 10th December 2025 and will be credited to your original payment source within 3 to 5 working days from the date of initiation. You may track your refund using the ARN number: P04-2522523-7802732-R021417.   Please note: Saturday, Sunday, and public holidays will not be included in business days. Refund timelines depend on the bank turnaround times.    If I misunderstood your concern, I request you to elaborate on your concern so we will be able to assist you better.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Habiba

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.

I would like to inform you that after the deletion of the medicine, the revised payable amount was ₹550. Accordingly, the item discount was updated from ₹283.52 to ₹228.52, and the order coupon discount was revised from ₹308.95 to ₹231.95.

As a result, the final payable amount was recalculated to ₹397.10. This amount has been initiated as a refund on 10th December 2025 and will be credited to your original payment source within 3 to 5 working days from the date of initiation. You may track your refund using the ARN number: P04-2522523-7802732-R021417.

Please note: Saturday, Sunday, and public holidays will not be included in business days. Refund timelines depend on the bank turnaround times.

If I misunderstood your concern, I request you to elaborate on your concern so we will be able to assist you better.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello,   Greetings from PharmEasy!   I understand your concern with regard to the payment mode of the order ID 657805522878332928. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.   According to the records, we got your payment successfully for this order.   ​   As per the system, cash on delivery option is available for you however, if you are unable to get the same. The inapplicability of the COD option depends on multiple reasons (types of medicines ordered, delivery location, supplier's location, etc.). For now, the option of cash on delivery is unavailable on this number. For future orders, if the option is available, it will be visible in the payment modes in the app and website.      I request you to use the online payment mode option from the App/ Website. Also, you can use multiple online payment offers available there, through which you can save more.  ​   If I misunderstood your concern, I request that you elaborate on your concern so we will be able to assist you better.   Awaiting your response.   Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

Once a specific mobile number has been used to create an account, it cannot be changed to another number within the same account.   If you wish to place an order with a new number, please create a new account with that number.      For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  Devdas.
notes.body_html:

I understand your concern with regard to the number change request. I will surely assist you with this.

Once a specific mobile number has been used to create an account, it cannot be changed to another number within the same account.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Devdas.

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Extremely Irresponsible Delay in Medicine Delivery – Serious Complaint Against PharmEasy & Its Courier Partner
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Team,

This email is to register my strongest possible complaint regarding the absolute mismanagement and irresponsible behaviour shown in handling my medicine order. Order No. - 656552369997107200-64514-HAU

I placed my monthly medicine order well in advance and I am also a PLUS Member for the entire year. Despite this, PharmEasy first committed that the order would be delivered on 10 December. On the same day, it again showed delivery by 10 PM. Now, after crossing the promised time, it suddenly shows 12 December, 10 PM as the new tentative delivery time.

Let me be very clear:
I do not have medicines left for tomorrow, and these are BP medications — delays are not a joke. I planned everything based on PharmEasy’s own committed delivery dates. If I now have to go out and purchase these medicines separately because of your team’s inefficiency, then what exactly is the “benefit” of my Plus Membership? What am I paying for?

Your team shipped the package late, and on top of that, you handed it over to a courier partner that reached the destination city 24+ hours ago but has still not delivered. Now that same courier partner needs another two days. This is nothing but a complete breakdown of responsibility, accountability, and basic customer service.

This is not just inconvenience — this is harassment.
In many households, especially with geriatric patients, children stay in one city and parents stay in another. Medicines are essential, not optional. When someone orders medicines days in advance and you still fail to deliver them even after your own estimated delivery date and time has passed, it reflects an alarming lack of professionalism.

And please do not attempt to compensate this delay by adding ₹50–₹100 to my wallet balance — that is meaningless and insulting. I am a Plus Member. Wallet credits don’t solve the problem because medicine purchases have clear restrictions and cannot be manipulated the way grocery or retail items are. So kindly don’t pretend to “compensate” customers with an amount that has zero real use.

I expect immediate action on the following:

1. Deliver my medicines within the next few hours — not in 2 more days.


2. Explain why the delivery date was changed twice without any accountability.


3. Explain why you chose such an irresponsible courier partner.


4. Provide a clear statement from your logistics team and higher management about how you plan to fix this issue permanently, not temporarily.



If PharmEasy cannot ensure timely delivery even after a customer pays for Plus Membership and orders days in advance, then this raises a serious question about the reliability and future of your service.

I look forward to an urgent and genuine response — not an automated apology and not a useless wallet credit. I have attached all the screenshot

Regards,
Prateik Sen
Registered Mobile Number: 99072 15796 
Order ID- 656552369997107200-64514-HAU

If you are a Seller:

• Alternatively, you can raise a support ticket directly through your Seller Panel by navigating to: Seller Panel → Help & Support → Create Ticket.

If you are a Buyer:
• Please contact the seller or the platform directly from which you made your purchase for any queries related to orders, modifications, cancellations, or refunds. We greatly appreciate your cooperation and understanding.
